leadingComments.value: if the source is a single word then it must be a named query
if we've got a string then expand any fragments
if we have a query builder element then ask it to generate the SQL and
provide any values it collected along the way.

trailingComments.value: TODO: should merge config whereValues and havingValues into any in config passed as argument

leadingComments.value: if it's not a named query then it's an SQL query possibly with embedded fragments

comments.value: if the source is a single word then it must be a named query
if we've got a string then expand any fragments
if we have a query builder element then ask it to generate the SQL and
provide any values it collected along the way.
